title: Introducing: Orange Gold Red
body: The new project of **Andrew Gregory**, of NY group **Tubetops**, **Orange Gold Red** sees the producer team up with fellow Brooklynite, vocalist [Kate Copland](https://soundcloud.com/katecopeland). With the pop sensibilities of the likes of **Robyn** or **Ellie Goulding**, and the quirky production more in line with **Grimes** or **Purity Ring**, their two debut tracks are rather gorgeous. There’s the brash, out-and-out pop of _Figure Eights,_ and the more refined, reserved, but no less beautiful wistful nature of _Ink_, where Gregory takes up backing vocals. Whilst it’s clear that **Orange Red Gold** is still very much in its infancy, these two tracks are an extremely promising sign of what’s to come.

With the pop sensibilities of the likes of Robyn or Ellie Goulding, and the quirky production more in line with Grimes or Purity Ring, their two debut tracks are rather gorgeous. \[…\]
